templates.title: Homelab
templates.description: Complete stack with AdGuard Home for DNS filtering and ad blocking, plus Nginx Proxy Manager for reverse proxy management with SSL certificates
templates.note: Requires external network 'homelab_network' to be created first. AdGuard Home will be accessible on port 3000 for initial setup, then port 80. Nginx Proxy Manager admin interface on port 81.
